channel.title: Lic on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Lic on Table41NYC

item.title: Ramen Shack
item.description: Decent ramen. Got some super fancy ramen, and it was fat. Not the best though and it’s in a not so great neighborhood.

item.title: Casa Enrique
item.description: Michelin 1 star restaurant for Mexican. Place isn’t great, but it’s not bad. Tacos are WAY too pricey at $6 a piece for such a tiny thing.

item.title: Waheyo
item.description: Interesting Chipotle/Dos Toros style but feels a little more ghetto? Food was ok but cheap.

item.title: Jora
item.description: It was ok. Meat was overly chewy and tough. Price wasn’t too bad.

item.title: Clever Blend
item.description: Bagel was pretty bad. The toasted coconut cold brew wasn’t that good.

item.title: Birch Coffee
item.description: The cold brew was pretty good, and the Ethiopian beans were good too.

item.title: Baroness Bar
item.description: Pretty good albeit expensive. The beer selection here is pretty good.

item.title: Burger Garage
item.description: Reminds me of Pops but more standard burgers. Still pretty good and not too pricey.

item.title: John Brown Smokehouse
item.description: For whatever reason, the brisket was dry even though it’s recommended by Yelpers. The pastrami was also dry and overly salty. Generally the BBQ was bad. Maybe it was just this one time, not sure.

item.title: Dutch Kills
item.description: Decent vibey bar similar to some LES places, but way out in Queens. But who knows maybe Long Island City might be the next spot after Williamsburg!
